articles.title: US Report Says China Warned Its Officials Not To Interfere With India Ties - NDTV
articles.description: China has warned American officials not to interfere in its relationship with India, the Pentagon has said in a report to the US Congress.
articles.content:
China warned US officials not to interfere with its ties with India, said Pentagon. (File)

articles.author: Alasdair Mackenzie
articles.title: Iran 0-1 USA: Christian Pulisic goal gives Americans victory to snatch second place in Group B - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Christian Pulisic scored a first-half winner and injured himself in the process as the United States earned a 1-0 win over Iran to reach World Cup last 16.
articles.content: Christian Pulisic of United States scores their team's first goal during the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 Group B match between IR Iran and USA at Al Thumama Stadium on November 29, 2022 in Doha, Qatar.… [+62 chars]

articles.author: Grégoire SAUVAGE
articles.title: On US state visit, Macron to draw the line on American protectionism - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: President Emmanuel Macron begins his three-day state visit to the US on Wednesday bolstered by shared bilateral visions on Russia’s invasion of Ukraine and China’s assertiveness in the Indo-Pacific. But President Joe Biden’s latest Inflation Reduction Act has…
